form.no-read-permission-notification: Please note: You do not have the permission to see the config!
form.no-write-permission-notification: Please note: You do not have the permission to edit the config!

jwtSettings.subtitle: JWT Settings
jwtSettings.label: Expiration time
jwtSettings.help: Set the JWT expiration time in hours. If you want to set the time to endless consider the 'endlessJWT' option inside the 'config.yml'.
jwtSettings.hoursWarning: It is not recommended to set the expiration time over 24 hours.
jwtSettings.endlessWarning: The expiration time is set to endless.

proxySettings.subtitle: Proxy Settings
proxySettings.passwordHelpText: The password for the proxy server authentication.
proxySettings.userHelpText: The username for the proxy server authentication.

excludesTable.label: Proxy Excludes
excludesTable.helpText: Glob patterns for hostnames, which should be excluded from proxy settings.

proxySettings.addExcludeError: The proxy exclude you want to add is not valid.

anonymousMode.title: Anonymous Access
anonymousMode.full: Enabled for Web UI and protocols

emergencyContacts.label: Emergency Contacts
emergencyContacts.helpText: List of users notified of administrative incidents.
emergencyContacts.ariaLabel: Add new user to emergency contacts

validation.date-format-invalid: The date format is not valid
validation.plugin-url-invalid: This is not a valid url

invalidateCaches.subtitle: Invalidate Caches
invalidateCaches.description: Invalidate caches manually to fix certain issues. Warning: After invalidation the SCM-Manager is slowed down.

invalidateSearchIndex.success: Rebuild of the search index has been triggered
invalidateSearchIndex.subtitle: Rebuild Search Index
invalidateSearchIndex.description: Rebuild the search index to fix certain issues with search results. Warning: While rebuilding the search index the SCM-Manager is slowed down.

help.dateFormatHelpText: Moments date format. Please have a look at the MomentJS documentation.
help.pluginUrlHelpText: The url of the Plugin Center API. Explanation of the placeholders: version = SCM-Manager Version; os = Operation System; arch = Architecture
help.pluginAuthUrlHelpText: The url of the Plugin Center authentication API.
help.alertsUrlHelpText: The url of the alerts api. This provides up-to-date alerts regarding your system. To disable this feature just leave the url blank.
help.releaseFeedUrlHelpText: The url of the RSS Release Feed for SCM-Manager. This provides up-to-date version information. To disable this feature just leave the url blank.
help.mailDomainNameHelpText: This domain name will be used to create email addresses for users without one when needed. It will not be used to send mails nor will be accessed otherwise.
help.disableGroupingGridHelpText: Disable repository Groups. A complete page reload is required after a change of this value.
help.allowAnonymousAccessHelpText: Anonymous users have access on granted repositories.
help.skipFailedAuthenticatorsHelpText: Do not stop the authentication chain, if an authenticator finds the user but fails to authenticate the user.
help.adminGroupsHelpText: Names of groups with admin permissions.
help.adminUsersHelpText: Names of users with admin permissions.
help.forceBaseUrlHelpText: Redirects to the base url if the request comes from a other url.
help.baseUrlHelpText: The url of the application (with context path), i.e. http://localhost:8080/scm
help.loginAttemptLimitHelpText: Maximum allowed login attempts. Use -1 to disable the login attempt limit.
help.loginAttemptLimitTimeoutHelpText: Timeout in seconds for users which are temporary disabled, because of too many failed login attempts.
help.enableXsrfProtectionHelpText: Enable XSRF Cookie Protection. Note: This feature is still experimental.
help.enabledUserConverterHelpText: Enable User Converter. Internal users will automatically be converted to external on their first login using an external system.
help.enabledApiKeysHelpText: Enable API Keys. API Keys can be used as additional authentication method by every user.
help.enabledFileSearchHelpText: Enable file search. File paths can be searched inside a single repository on the source viewer.
help.loginInfoUrlHelpText: URL to login information (plugin and feature tips at login page). If this is omitted, no login information will be displayed.
